p:
Similar to the mice model used in EBOV, these animals were chimeric IFNαR−/− C57BL/6 animals and, thus, lacked type‐I IFN receptor function and, therefore, the model used was a simple target cell limited model. In order to gain information on the potential role of ribavirin on loss cell death, we assumed that the level of aspartate amino transferase (AST, noted A) reflected cell loss, following models previously developed in HCV to quantify the levels of hepatocytes injury using alanine aminotransferase dynamics
